Posts.Content: Mar 26, 2011 02:54PM SueTacoma wrote: Hi Melinda, I was diagnosed age 42, with grade 3, IDC, 1.7 cm.  I was really scared and cried a lot.  My children were only 3 and 6 years old while I was diagnosed.  I also have to wait for 3 weeks before the surgery.  I remember those LONG 3 weeks.  Well, this was 6.5 years ago.  I am doing well.  Hope this will help you. Sue

Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2008 01:30PM SueTacoma wrote: I believe stress plays a big role in developing breast cacner.  I was working full time with high stress level job, two young children.  My son is very challenging to raise.  We have 10 years of very unhappy marriage.  Before I was diagnosed 4 years ago, I was so unhappy and depressed, I told my friend if I continue to look like this, I will get cacner.  Funny then it turned out I did get one!! Sue
